amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for enforcement of any of the provisions in the memorandum entitled "Guidelines on Relations With Taiwan".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds for enforcement of any of the provisions in the memorandum entitled "Guidelines on Relations With Taiwan".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tancredo amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
